metadata.title: CVE-2020-26797 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
Mediainfo before version 20.08 has a heap buffer overflow vulnerability via MediaInfoLib::File_Gxf::ChooseParser_ChannelGrouping.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2020-26797` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libmediainfo0v5 - 20.09+dfsg-1
python3-mediainfodll - 20.09+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libmediainfo package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '20.09+dfsg-1').
